snippet.title: Blast to the Past! | Gameplay Trailer 2
snippet.description:
This Trailer was released to celebrate Security Breach's First Gameplay Trailer that came out in Playstation's Showcase on February 25th 2021

On September 16th 2020, Security Breach was revealed, February 25th, 2021, the first gameplay trailer was shown, full of potential and mystery. Then came December 16th 2021, the release of Security Breach full of cut content and lost potential. A fundamentally flawed game. 

The team behind Blast to the Past! is taking the vanilla game and reshaping it to become something great, something that fans were hoping for. Blast to the Past! is a mod that restores all cut content back to Security Breach and takes a step further by adding new content and new gameplay features and bits of story to help rekindle the spark that is Security Breach! Have a Faz-errific day and keep a look out for teasers and the future release!

https://discord.gg/bttp
https://linktr.ee/teambttp
https://linktr.ee/donothan
